ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and I say 'glub glub'. What am I?
I am big and blue, and boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I cover most of the Earth.

ocean.question: I have a shell and live on the beach. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🏖️ You can find me on the sand.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have suckers on my arms.
⚫ Some say I can change colors.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk sideways on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🚶 I walk in a funny way.

ocean.question: I am very big and swim in the ocean. People sometimes call me an Orca. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a type of whale.

ocean.question: I'm a long, thin fish that looks like a snake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I don't have scales like most fish.
🌊 Some of me can give you a little shock!

ocean.question: I am a very small, pink sea animal that you can eat.

hints.text: 🍤 I start out grey and turn pink when cooked.
🌊 Some people put me on the barbeque

ocean.question: I'm flat and look like a star, and live at the bottom of the ocean.

hints.text: 🌊 Some people call me a 'sea star'.

ocean.question: I float in the ocean and sting if you touch me. What am I?

hints.text: 🩹 If I sting, you will need a bandage

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on a tree. What am I?

hints.text: ❤️ You can eat me as a snack.

food.question: I am long and yellow, and monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys peel me before they eat me.
💛 I am a fruit that is sweet.
☀️ I am shaped like a crescent moon.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I help you grow big and strong.
🐄 I come from an animal that says 'Moo!'
🥣 You can pour me on your cereal.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?
I am brown and sweet, and you can spread me on bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I'm made from something that grows on a tree.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.

food.question: I am green and round, and sometimes I am on pizza. What am I?

hints.text: 🫒 I grow on trees in warm places.

food.question: I am small and round and can be red, green, or black. What am I?

hints.text: 🍷 Juice and raisins are made from me.

food.question: I am yellow or white and you can scramble me or fry me. What am I?
I am orange and juicy, and grow on a tree in warm places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 My color is similar to the sun.
🥤 You can squeeze me to make juice.

food.question: I am green and long. You can slice me for a salad or make pickles out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am a type of gourd.
🥪 You can put me on a sandwich.
